H0.text: Which Englsih football club play home matches at the Sports Direct Arena. Newcastle United Reserves

H1.text: Which Englsih football club play home matches at the Sports Direct Arena. Gateshead FC

H2.text: Which Englsih football club play home matches at the Sports Direct Arena. Sunderland AFC

H3.text: Which Englsih football club play home matches at the Sports Direct Arena. NUFC

A4.text: Gateshead Football Club play their home matches at the Gateshead International Stadium.

A5.text: The club have played at the Gateshead International Stadium since their establishment.

A6.text: St James' Park is the home of Newcastle United.

A7.text: St James' Park has been the home ground of Newcastle United since 1892.
